page.title: 19Conclusion to Topic.
page.content: Today Tempsford is a small village in the heart of Bedfordshire .A village which many travellers on the A1 must pass through without even knowing. Its glory lays in the past ,being a centre of many forms of transport. The village has had to change with the times,no longer is the entire population made up of local people. No longer are homes small and built from only local materials.Village life no longer revolves around the church and the manor house. Tempsford has adapted well to changes in particular the cruel disection of modern roads and for the most part it is an unspoilt village,long may it remain so. The End.
